item.description: Come celebrate your Valentine weekend "Desi Bollywood Style" with Din Check! Bring your Valentine date and celebrate a fun filled evening with live Bollywood music, dance, and drinks! Not just for couples - a great place for singles to meet other singles as well! DATE: Saturday Feb 11, 2012 HOURS: 10 pm to 1 am PLACE: BOLLYWOOD GRILL, 50 Worcester Road,(Rt. 9) Framingham, MA 01702. http://www.bollywoodg.... Call (508) 626-9988 for any further details or directions DRESS CODE: Dress to Impress! Cover Charge: $10 per person
item.name: Valentine Weekend with LIVE DESI BAND - for couples and singles!
